headline: Decisions and ProcessMaker Recognized as Major Contenders in Everest Group Process Orchestration Products PEAK Matrix® Assessment 2025
summary: Decisions and ProcessMaker, recently merged providers of leading global business process automation and orchestration platforms, today announced that they have significantly strengthened their positions in the Everest Group Process Orchestration Products PEAK Matrix® Assessment 2025.

raw.headline: Decisions and ProcessMaker Recognized as Major Contenders in Everest Group Process Orchestration Products PEAK Matrix® Assessment 2025
raw.summary: Decisions and ProcessMaker, recently merged providers of leading global business process automation and orchestration platforms, today announced that they have significantly strengthened their positions in the Everest Group Process Orchestration Products PEAK Matrix® Assessment 2025.

headline: GEP NAMED THE CLEAR LEADER IN EVEREST GROUP'S 'AGENTIC AI APPLICATIONS IN PROCUREMENT'
summary: GEP®, a leading provider of AI-driven procurement and supply chain software and services for Fortune 500 and Global 2000 enterprises worldwide, announced that that Everest Group has named it the outright leader in its 'Innovation: Agentic AI Applications in Procurement' assessment — the firm's top designation in providing agentic AI agents to automate procurement, and improve speed, resilience, and data-driven decisions.

raw.headline: GEP NAMED THE CLEAR LEADER IN EVEREST GROUP'S 'AGENTIC AI APPLICATIONS IN PROCUREMENT'
raw.summary: GEP®, a leading provider of AI-driven procurement and supply chain software and services for Fortune 500 and Global 2000 enterprises worldwide, announced that that Everest Group has named it the outright leader in its 'Innovation: Agentic AI Applications in Procurement' assessment — the firm's top designation in providing agentic AI agents to automate procurement, and improve speed, resilience, and data-driven decisions.

headline: Everest Group appoints Elias Habayeb as new EVP and CFO
summary: Habayeb will replace Mark Kociancic, who is set to retire from the company after five years.

raw.summary: Habayeb will replace Mark Kociancic, who is set to retire from the company after five years.
